General.Name: Chengdu Jafaantai Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Jiafaantai Education Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of educational information products in China. Its products include smart class, authentication terminal, confidential box for test paper delivery, identity collection terminal, infrared HD dome camera, infrared high-definition gun camera, HD decoding matrix, standard test high-definition TV wall management platform, standard test network streaming media storage platform, smart standby server, high-tech shielded terminal, detection server, and HD network storage management platform. The company also offers digital campus management platform, smart campus epidemic prevention and control management system, intelligent personnel interview system, paperless physical examination command system, AI face recognition temperature sensing terminal, test paper tracking system, and classroom ecosystem. In addition, it provides online inspection system construction plan, identity authentication system construction plan, cheating prevention and control system construction plan, inspection and command system construction plan, English listening and speaking evaluation solution, paperless physical examination solution, test paper circulation system construction plan, educational examination comprehensive management platform, teaching and testing solution, smart campus overall solution, college entrance examination solution, regional smart education solution, and life education ecological service system. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Jiafaantai Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Chengdu Jiafaantai Education Technology Co.,Ltd. in June 2018. Chengdu Jiafaantai Education Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 188, Wuke West 2nd Road, Chengdu, China
